title: Small Screen Big Lies
description: Dashing television host Steve Saunders has it all, a killer smile, lucrative career and a different woman to sleep with every night. Until one day, rumors fly in about a mysterious woman who is responsible for the exit of Steve's closest rival Tyler. Now Steve must take up a gauntlet, all the while mentoring his protégé, Abhish. The young upstart has problems of his own, living up to his mentor's image, failing one screen test after the other. His only saving grace is falling in love with the beautiful Chloe, who unknown to Abhish has a dark secret...her psychotic ex-husband. Battling for their future, the lives and dreams of friends, family and colleagues are intermingled in a complex web of deceit, blackmail and the struggle for power.
author: Kishore Daswani
